author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sintesi Board Approves Service Contracts With Met.Extra And Titalia
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - SINTESI SOCIETA DI INVESTIMENTI E PARTECIPAZIONI SPA:
* APPROVES SERVICE CONTRACTS WITH MET.EXTRA AND TITALIA * TO SUPPLY SERVICES TO MET.EXTRA AND TITALIA IN ADMINISTRATION, FINANCE, CONTROL AND STRATEGIC AREAS
* CONTRACTS LAST UNTIL END-2018 AND ENVISAGE A MONTHLY PAYMENT OF EUR 29,000 PLUS VAT
* SINTESI IS CONTROLLED BY THE SAME SHAREHOLDERS OF MET.EXTRA AND TITALIA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
